sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Cog, Beaker, Fuel, Wheat, Utensils, Monitor, Zap, Users, BookOpen, ArrowRight } from 'lucide-react'; const DepartmentsPage = () => { const departments = [ { id: 'mechanical', name: 'Mechanical Engineering', icon: Cog, description: 'Design, analysis, and manufacturing of mechanical systems and machines.', hod: 'Prof. John Akpan', studentCount: '450+', courses: '25+', color: 'from-blue-500 to-blue-600', bgImage: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-blue-50 to-blue-100' }, { id: 'chemical', name: 'Chemical Engineering', icon: Beaker, description: 'Process design, optimization, and control in chemical industries.', hod: 'Dr. Mary Okon', studentCount: '320+', courses: '22+', color: 'from-green-500 to-green-600', bgImage: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-green-50 to-green-100' }, { id: 'petroleum', name: 'Petroleum Engineering', icon: Fuel, description: 'Exploration, extraction, and production of oil and gas resources.', hod: 'Prof. David Etim', studentCount: '280+', courses: '20+', color: 'from-orange-500 to-orange-600', bgImage: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-orange-50 to-orange-100' }, { id: 'agricultural', name: 'Agricultural Engineering', icon: Wheat, description: 'Application of engineering principles to agricultural production.', hod: 'Dr. Grace Udoh', studentCount: '200+', courses: '18+', color: 'from-yellow-500 to-yellow-600', bgImage: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-yellow-50 to-yellow-100' }, { id: 'food', name: 'Food Engineering', icon: Utensils, description: 'Processing, preservation, and packaging of food products.', hod: 'Prof. Samuel Udo', studentCount: '180+', courses: '16+', color: 'from-red-500 to-red-600', bgImage: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-red-50 to-red-100' }, { id: 'computer', name: 'Computer Engineering', icon: Monitor, description: 'Hardware and software systems design and development.', hod: 'Dr. Emmanuel Bassey', studentCount: '380+', courses: '24+', color: 'from-purple-500 to-purple-600', bgImage: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-purple-50 to-purple-100' }, { id: 'electrical', name: 'Electrical Engineering', icon: Zap, description: 'Power systems, electronics, and electrical infrastructure.', hod: 'Prof. Peter Obot', studentCount: '420+', courses: '26+', color: 'from-indigo-500 to-indigo-600', bgImage: 'bg-gradient-to-br from-indigo-50 to-indigo-100' } ]; const containerVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0 }, visible: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.1 } } }; const cardVariants = { hidden: { opacity: 0, y: 50 }, visible: { opacity: 1, y: 0, transition: { duration: 0.6, ease: "easeOut" } } }; return (
{/* Header Section */}

Engineering Departments

Explore our seven world-class engineering departments and discover the resources that will shape your academic journey.

2,000+ Students
150+ Courses
{/* Departments Grid */}

{/* Department Icon & Header */}

{department.name}

{department.description}

{/* Department Stats */}
{department.studentCount}
Students
{department.courses}
Courses
HOD: {department.hod}
{/* Action Button */}

); })}
{/* Quick Stats Section */}

7
Departments

Students

Faculty Members
); }; export default DepartmentsPage;
